page.title: 16POEM OF THE ROYAL VISIT
page.content: We were in our places,Ready to act our play,Waiting for the Princess,It was our special day.Then in walked Prince Charles,Into a hall of applause,Next we saw Princess Diana walking through the doors.They were followed by the equerry Then they took their chairs,We started to play our music,The procession came on in pairs.I wasn't very nervous,As the time went by,I saw Princess Diana smiling,Even thought she looked shy. The end of our play ,Soon it was in sight,The tele cameras filming,The sun shone very bright.When our play had finished,Lady Di walked around,She even came and talked to us,We didn't make a sound.Soon she had left,And Â£our'day had finished,I'm really glad they came, Just a dream accomplished. KAREN McNAMARA AGED12
